problem_text: In the figure, \triangle A B C is isosceles, \triangle D C E is equilateral, and \triangle F C G is isosceles. Find the measure of the \angle 4 at vertex C.
compact_text: In the figure, \triangle ABC is isosceles, \triangle DCE is equilateral, and \triangle FCG is isosceles. Find the measure of the \angle 4 at vertex C.
annotat_text: In the figure, $ \triangle ABC$ is isosceles, $ \triangle DCE$ is equilateral, and $ \triangle FCG$ is isosceles. Find the measures of the $\angle 4$ at vertex $C$.
